description:
Stream your device camera to your PeerTube channel! PeerTube Live helps you broadcast your device camera to your PeerTube channel. Connect with the whole fediverse live from your device. (You will need an account on the PeerTube instance of your choice)
Features: * Works with any PeerTube instance! * Multiple account supported * Set up your stream as you want (description, title, visibilityâ€¦) * Switch between front & back cameras * Easy to use PeerTube is a free and federated alternative to centralized video platforms, developed by the French non-profit Framasoft. Learn more about PeerTube on joinpeertube.org!
